message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_DESCRIPTION_TEXT
message.locale: Description Text is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_DOMAIN_NAME
message.locale: Domain Name is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_DATE_FORMAT
message.locale: Please enter your date of birth in a valid date format.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_REMOVE_LAST_FACTOR
message.locale: You cannot remove the last remaining factor when Authentication is still active.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_ACTIVATE_WITH_NO_FACTORS
message.locale: You cannot activate Authentication if there are no active Authentication Factors.
